definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There was a correlation between vertebral artery tortuosity and cervical spondylotic change.
sentences.chinese: 椎動脈扭曲與頸椎退行性變有關。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate arthroscopic diagnosis and management of degenerative lesion of femoral intercondylar fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討股骨髁間窩退行性變的診斷及處理。

sentences.english: Xeroderma pigmentosum is an autosomal recessive disease.
sentences.chinese: 著色性幹皮病是一種常染色體的退行性疾病。

sentences.english: Retrogressive change occurs at joints of cervical vertebral processes, shown by radiological examination.
sentences.chinese: 影像學檢查，關節突關節呈退行性改變。

sentences.english: Similar mechanical and degenerative changes occur in the vitreous.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃體同樣發生機械性和退行性變化。

sentences.english: Here is another example of degenerative osteoarthritis in which there is prominent "lipping" of the vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎顯著“脣形變”的退行性骨關節炎。

sentences.english: Of lumbar retreat travel sex change to often can cause lumbago symptom.
sentences.chinese: 腰椎的退行性改變常可導致腰痛症狀。

sentences.english: Cavalier King Charles Spaniels have an inherited form of this disease.
sentences.chinese: 查理斯王小獵犬具有遺傳性退行性二尖瓣病變。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the characteristics of echocardiogram in senile degenerative heart valvular disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討老年人退行性心臟瓣膜病的超聲心動圖特點。

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
